TopicTitle: Hitler finds out there will not be a Mars in .15

Articles.Content:
So before I 'offend' anyone, I want to emphatically state that Hitler\'s opinion on the subject does NOT reflect my views at all. In fact, my line '...they\'ve been overloaded as it is.' coming from Jodl, is more of my opinion. Anyway, you can tell how bored I was. To sit down and actually make a Hitler Parody about Kerbal Space Program.

PS: Tiberion, NovaSilisko, HarvesteR and Tosh, you all get mentioned.

I hope my disclaimer was enough to stop comments like, 'you dumbass! Harv is working hard! Why are you so pissed!' and 'Fuck you!'

Anyway, I\'m really glad we\'ve gotten as much as we have from Kerbal Space Program, so I thank the dev team heavily.

As for Hitler... Well... There\'s a reason he\'s only liked when he\'s parodied!

Hitler finds out there will not be a Mars in .15
I suppose to help relieve his frustration, he can make giant robots now with Damned Robotics.

Hitler\'s not such a bad guy. After all, he did kill Hitler.

No offense meant, simply a joke.

Hitler\'s not such a bad guy. After all, he did kill Hitler.

No offense meant, simply a joke.

There\'s two hitlers.

There\'s the crazy jew-hunting global menace we defeated in 1945, and then there is internet hitler, a misunderstood sensitive dictator with an insecurity problem and a short temper.
He is only worried about the Mods because he couldn\'t put a stock rocket on the Mun!

Hmm... I like the ending to it. Advertising for some of the mod makers perhaps.

Also, that is a bit of speculation going on in there. Is the kerbal version of mars coming in 0.16?
I really really hate this blasted 'over used to death' parody. You don\'t have anything else better to do Vince?
Oh hello there, captain Buzzkill. ;P

I really really hate this blasted 'over used to death' parody. You don\'t have anything else better to do Vince?

No. haha
It\'s very hard to follow the subtitles when i\'m german
You deserve a cookie for making me laugh once in the video.
most of them are good, and this is awesome

I was getting tired of this Hitler video; it was getting over-used.

But this had me laughing out loud in a public library.

I hate you.
Why not make then a Mars ship mod in KSP? ;P

Heh, nice.

I suppose I am on some list deep in the CIA now as some sort of Nazi supporter. Thanks for that

Hitler parodies are the best.

Awesome vid.

Btw, it isn\'t overused at all. It\'s brilliant IMO.

Thanks for finding this funny, guys. I thought it was just a pretty corny KSP rage, but apparently you guys liked it. The support is appreciated. I have ideas for other KSP Hitler videos, but I don\'t want to make too many.
Yeah one was probably enough
Tiberion, I know this is off topic as hell, but I just noticed your profile picture. What mods exactly do you have for that shuttle?

Tiberion, I know this is off topic as hell, but I just noticed your profile picture. What mods exactly do you have for that shuttle?

His. Check his sig.

Its the TiberDyne Shuttle Booster System, self contained; It has cloned parts from the old C7 pack, as well a variant of Sarkun\'s cargobay plugin and some mechjeb modules if you want them (the DLLs are a couple of versions old now, I think)

Its the TiberDyne Shuttle Booster System, self contained; It has cloned parts from the old C7 pack, as well a variant of Sarkun\'s cargobay plugin and some mechjeb modules if you want them (the DLLs are a couple of versions old now, I think)

Oh. I downloaded that pack but it said I didn\'t have the C7 Cockpit. I assume it didn\'t come with the mod. Would you mind sending the whole pack (all the components for the shuttle system)? Thanks/.

This was actually pretty funny. My favorite bit:

'Don\'t worry, HarvesteR will add Mars in .16' Had me laughing the rest of the video. ;D
Am I the only one in the world that generally dislikes any kind of nazi joke?

Am I the only one in the world that generally dislikes any kind of nazi joke?

There\'s always the over-sensitive folks, you know.
